title: Vaajratiki Swagatam: Exquisite Diamond and Emerald Floral Choker
materials: Rubies (1.25 ct - pendant). Features a lustrous Hyderabadi Polish.
features: This stunning choker features an intricate floral design meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans. The choker showcases a beautiful arrangement of diamonds and emeralds. The centerpiece pendant has a floral design with diamond. The design has golden ball hangings all around.
colors: Primarily Gold with sparkling White Diamonds and lush Green Emeralds
creating a rich and opulent color palette.
occasions: and grand festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranthi. This piece seamlessly blends traditional aesthetics with a modern touch
making it suitable for contemporary events as well.
description: Crafted with exceptional attention to detail, this choker is a testament to Hyderabad's rich jewelry-making heritage. Its radiant diamonds and vibrant emeralds symbolize prosperity and good fortune, making it a cherished heirloom to be passed down through generations.
